## ApolloClient class

A version of `ApolloClient` to be used with streaming SSR.

For more documentation, please see [the Apollo Client API documentation](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/api/core/ApolloClient)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
